verses.verse: Paul <WG3972>, a prisoner<WG1198> of Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424>, and<WG2532> Timothy<WG5095> our brother<WG80>, to Philemon<WG5371> our<WG2257> beloved<WG27> and<WG2532> fellow-worker<WG4904>,
and <WG2532> to<WG27> Apphia<WG682> our sister<WG2532>, and to<WG27> Archippus<WG751> our<WG2257> fellow-soldier<WG4961>, and<WG2532> to the church<WG1577> in<WG2596> thy<WG4675> house<WG3624>:
Grace <WG5485> to you<WG5213> and<WG2532> peace<WG1515> from<WG575> God<WG2316> our<WG2257> Father<WG3962> and<WG2532> the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>.
I thank<WG2168> my<WG3450> God<WG2316> always<WG3842>, making<WG4160> mention<WG3417> of thee<WG4675> in<WG1909> my<WG3450> prayers<WG4335>,

hearing <WG191> of thy<WG4675> love<WG26>, and<WG2532> of the faith<WG4102> which<WG3739> thou hast<WG2192> toward<WG4314> the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424>, and<WG2532> toward<WG1519> all<WG3956> the saints<WG40>;

that <WG3704> the fellowship<WG2842> of thy<WG4675> faith<WG4102> may become<WG1096> effectual<WG1756>, in<WG1722> the knowledge<WG1922> of every<WG3956> good thing<WG18> which is<WG3588> in<WG1722> you<WG5213>, unto<WG1519> Christ<WG5547>.

For <WG1063> I had<WG2192> much<WG4183> joy<WG5479> and<WG2532> comfort<WG3874> in<WG1909> thy<WG4675> love<WG26>, because<WG3754> the hearts<WG4698> of the saints<WG40> have been refreshed<WG373> through<WG1223> thee<WG4675>, brother<WG80>.
Wherefore <WG1352>, though I have<WG2192> all<WG4183> boldness<WG3954> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> to enjoin<WG2004> thee<WG4671> that which is befitting<WG433>,

yet for<WG1223> love<WG26>'s sake<WG1223> I<WG3870> rather<WG3123> beseech<WG3870>, being<WG5607> such a one<WG5108> as<WG5613> Paul<WG3972> the aged<WG4246>, and<WG1161> now<WG3570> a prisoner<WG1198> also<WG2532> of Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424>:
I beseech<WG3870> thee<WG4571> for<WG4012> my<WG1700> child<WG5043>, whom<WG3739> I have begotten<WG1080> in<WG1722> my<WG3450> bonds<WG1199>, Onesimus<WG3682>,
who <WG3588> once<WG4218> was<WG3588> unprofitable<WG890> to thee<WG4671>, but<WG1161> now<WG3570> is profitable<WG2173> to thee<WG4671> and<WG2532> to me<WG1698>:
whom <WG3739> I have sent back<WG375> to thee4771, 1161 in<WG4355> his own person<WG846>, that<WG5124> is<WG2076>, my very<WG1699> heart<WG4698>:

whom <WG3739> I<WG1473> would<WG1014> fain have kept<WG2722> with<WG4314> me<WG1683>, that<WG2443> in<WG5228> thy<WG4675> behalf<WG5228> he might minister<WG1247> unto me<WG3427> in<WG1722> the bonds<WG1199> of the gospel<WG2098>:

but <WG1161> without<WG5565> thy<WG4674> mind<WG1106> I<WG2309> would do<WG4160> nothing<WG3762>; that<WG2443> thy<WG4675> goodness<WG18> should<WG5600> not<WG3361> be<WG5600> as of<WG2596> necessity<WG318>, but<WG235> of<WG2596> free will<WG1595>.
For <WG1063> perhaps<WG5029> he<WG5563> was therefore<WG5124> parted<WG5563> from thee for<WG4314> a season<WG5610>, that<WG2443> thou shouldest have<WG568> him<WG846> for ever<WG166>;

no longer<WG3765> as<WG5613> a servant<WG1401>, but<WG235> more<WG5228> than a servant<WG1401>, a brother<WG80> beloved<WG27>, specially<WG3122> to me<WG1698>, but<WG1161> how much<WG4214> rather<WG3123> to thee<WG4671>, both<WG2532> in<WG1722> the flesh<WG4561> and<WG2532> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962>.
If <WG1487> then<WG3767> thou countest<WG2192> me<WG1691> a partner<WG2844>, receive<WG4355> him<WG846> as<WG5613> myself<WG1691>.
But if<WG1487> he hath wronged<WG91> thee<WG4571> at all<WG2228>, or oweth<WG3784> thee<WG4571> aught<WG1677>, put that<WG5124> to mine<WG1698> account<WG1677>;

I <WG1473> Paul<WG3972> write<WG1125> it<WG1473> with mine own<WG1699> hand<WG5495>, I<WG1473> will repay<WG661> it<WG2443>: that I say<WG3004> not<WG3361> unto thee<WG4671> that<WG3754> thou owest<WG4359> to me<WG3427> even<WG2532> thine own self<WG4572> besides<WG4359>.
Yea <WG3483>, brother<WG80>, let<WG3685> me<WG1473> have joy<WG3685> of thee<WG4675> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962>: refresh<WG373> my<WG3450> heart<WG4698> in<WG1722> Christ<WG2962>.

Having confidence<WG3982> in<WG5218> thine<WG4675> obedience<WG5218> I write<WG1125> unto thee<WG4671>, knowing<WG1492> that<WG3754> thou wilt do<WG4160> even<WG2532> beyond<WG5228> what I say<WG3004>.

But <WG1161> withal<WG260> prepare<WG2090> me<WG3427> also<WG2532> a lodging<WG3578>: for<WG1063> I hope<WG1679> that<WG3754> through<WG1223> your<WG5216> prayers<WG4335> I shall be granted<WG5483> unto you<WG5213>.
Epaphras <WG1889>, my<WG3450> fellow-prisoner<WG4869> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424>, saluteth<WG782> thee<WG4571>;
and so do Mark<WG3138>, Aristarchus<WG708>, Demas<WG1214>, Luke<WG3065>, my<WG3450> fellow-workers<WG4904>.
The grace<WG5485> of our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> be with<WG3326> your<WG5216> spirit<WG4151>. Amen<WG281>.
